Blog.post: urlLink ESSAY EDITING 4U Just made my new site, now my editing is free. Went to the movies yesterday with tyler mire, tyler mathieu, jessica carr and a few others, wanted MARTI JONES to come but I guess our secret relationship has become too hot to handle...later
Ok, I said I was gonna fail those exams, but I guess I was wrong. I actually think I did ok...well, schools out. aight, cya
I failed all my exams!!! No, I didn't just fail them, i got an F-...

WOW! I have never studied so much in my life. I'm writing in here because everyone has been telling me to relax and take a break, so I am doing just that. English down, Chemistry, Algebra, History, and Spanish to go! Only goin to school tomorrow for 2 hours, so I guess that's a plus. ...today I devoted my entire day to studying, mainly for chemistry. I also squeezed in a soccer game that really sucked. We lost. YES, this is true. I, justin, lost at something. I know you are truly devastated, but you will get over it. Anyway, I was so busy today that I didn't even edit any papers! It feels odd...My total revenue still stands at $4,876. Darn, I really wanted more. Oh, and just so you know, my little blog things are going to be very short. I'm only doing this because several people have said I must. So there you go. I am great and you are not. That is what happened today...

urlLink Essay Editing 4U - Free Essay Editing I dont think im gonna do this nemore. Neway, heres my new site! Im gonna spend some of my money (which i may add is a very large sum...i say that bc it makes brian mad) to buy the domain www.essayediting4u.com UNTIL THEN, enjoy my free site @ www.geocities.com/essayediting4u/essay.html OR click on "no more" above. later
